title: Vegan banana, blueberry and pecan pancakes
description: This delicious dairy-free, egg-free recipe is jam-packed with good ingredients. A scoop of coconut ice cream will turn them into a feel-good pudding, too.
ingredients: 150ml/5fl oz coconut milk or almond milk
2 bananas, peeled and cut into thin slices
a few pecan nuts, finely chopped
